address: Xã Ayun, Huyện Mang Yang, Tỉnh Gia Lai
thought:
**Analyzing the Vietnamese Address for Mapping**

Okay, I've got a Vietnamese address to map: "Xã Ayun, Huyện Mang Yang, Tỉnh Gia Lai."  First things first, the province is clearly "Tỉnh Gia Lai," and I know from my familiarity with the administrative structure that the province name hasn't changed (per resolution 60-NQ/TW, Gia Lai remains Gia Lai).

Now, I need to pinpoint the specific "Xã Ayun" within "Huyện Mang Yang."  I've got a stack of resolutions to work through, and I'm laser-focused on finding the relevant one.  My hunch is that there will be a specific resolution outlining the recent changes for this area.

I scanned through the "Other resolutions" and found "1664/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Gia Lai." Bingo! This is the one I need.  I carefully checked each line.

Line 56 mentioned "Xã Ayun" but immediately specified "(huyện Chư Sê)" - not our target from Mang Yang, so I skipped it. Then, Line 95 grabbed my attention: "Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Đak Jơ Ta và xã Ayun (huyện Mang Yang) thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Ayun**." Perfect! That's it! It exactly matches the "Xã Ayun" from "Huyện Mang Yang" in my input.  This suggests that "Xã Ayun" from Mang Yang has merged with "Xã Đak Jơ Ta" to form a *new* "Xã Ayun."

Now, I'll need to check the "New wards" list to confirm.  I looked for "Xã Ayun" in "Tỉnh Gia Lai."  And there it is:  `{"ward_code":"23798","ward_name":"Xã Ayun","province_name":"Tỉnh Gia Lai"}`.  It's a complete match!

So, I'm confident in my findings.  The province is "Tỉnh Gia Lai". The new ward name is "Xã Ayun". The ward code is "23798." I also made sure to double-check the resolution to eliminate any other conflicting instances of "Xã Ayun." The other mentions of "Ayun" were in completely different districts. This is a solid, unambiguous match. My output will reflect these findings with a high confidence level and properly cited references.

citation.header: 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Gia Lai
citation.line: 95. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Đak Jơ Ta và xã Ayun (huyện Mang Yang) thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Ayun**.
